authors.author: Lynn DeShazo Â© 1999 Integrity's Hosanna! Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How great are you Lord
how great is your mercy
how great are the things
that you have done for me
how great are you lord
your loving kindness
is filling my heart as i sing
how great are you lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How great is your love that reaches to the heavens
how great is the heart that sought and rescued me
